title: Chainlink's LINK Slips to 6-Week Low, but Potential Trend Shift Has Emerged
source: CoinDesk: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Crypto News and Price Data

body.raw: LINK is down nearly 28% since the August highs amid broader crypto weakness, but  the $20 support line hints at a potential recovery.
